author: Reuters
title: Embraer (EMBR3) entrega 30 aeronaves no 1¬∫ trimestre, alta anual de 20%
text:
S√ÉO PAULO (Reuters) ‚Äì A Embraer ( EMBR3 ) entregou 30 aeronaves no primeiro trimestre, sendo 7 avi√µes comerciais e 23 jatos executivos, conforme comunicado divulgado ao mercado nesta quarta-feira.
O resultado foi 20% superior ao registrado no primeiro trimestre do ano passado, quando 25 avi√µes foram entregues.
Leia tamb√©m Embraer: a√ß√£o j√° subiu demais ap√≥s saltar 100% em 12 meses ou h√° espa√ßo para mais? XP tem recomenda√ß√£o neutra para os ativos, mas casas como JPMorgan e Bradesco BBI recomendam compra
As entregas no segmento de avia√ß√£o executiva representaram um aumento de 28% em compara√ß√£o com o apurado nos primeiros tr√™s meses de 2024, enquanto no segmento de avia√ß√£o comercial o saldo de entregas ficou est√°vel.
A Embraer espera entregar este ano entre 77 e 85 aeronaves comerciais (10% acima no comparativo anual, considerando o ponto m√©dio da proje√ß√£o) e cerca de 145 a 155 jatos executivos (15% superior ano sobre ano, tamb√©m com base no ponto m√©dio).

author: Field Level Media
title: Giants place INF Wlmer Flores (knee) on 10-day injured list | Fieldlevel | mdjonline.com
text: The San Francisco Giants placed infielder Wilmer Flores on the 10-day injured list on Thursday because of right knee tendonitis. The move was retroactive to Wednesday. In a corresponding move, the Giants recalled infielder David Villar from Triple-A Sacramento. "He's a good hitter," Giants manager Bob Melvin said of Villar. "He fits into this group. This will be a better opportunity for him here. He'll play the Wilmer role as far as facing lefties." Flores, 32, last played on Tuesday. He had missed nine games with the same injury in late June and early July. "Never really cleared up," Melvin said. "When you're not playing as much and not swinging how you're used to, you're putting in a lot of extra work, and it's not allowing it to really heal." Flores is batting .206 with four home runs and 26 RBIs in 71 games this season. For his 12-year career, Flores is batting .260 with 153 homers and 532 RBIs in 1,212 games for the New York Mets (2013-18), Arizona Diamondbacks (2019) and Giants. Villar, 27, is 5-for-17 (.294) with one homer and four RBIs in six games with San Francisco. In parts of three seasons since 2022, he is batting .199 with 15 home runs and 40 RBIs in 104 games. --Field Level Media

author: Carolina Montenegro
title: Virgen
text:
El misterio de la Virgen de Trevignano ha dado un giro inesperado. Las supuestas l√°grimas de sangre que muchos cre√≠an milagrosas, resultaron tener un origen bastante terrenal, seg√∫n los resultados de un an√°lisis de laboratorio que ha puesto a tambalear la fe de muchos seguidores.
La Universidad de Roma Tor Vergata confirm√≥ que el l√≠quido que brotaba de la figura religiosa es sangre humana y femenina.
Se descartaron las teor√≠as que apuntaban a sangre de cerdo o alg√∫n pigmento artificial. El detalle que ha desatado la pol√©mica es que el ADN encontrado coincide con el material gen√©tico de Gisella Cardia, cuyo nombre de nacimiento es Maria Giuseppa Scarpulla, la autoproclamada vidente de Trevignano.
Publicidad
¬øPor qu√© invent√≥ que la Virgen lloraba?
Publicidad
Desde 2016, Cardi a aseguraba recibir apariciones de la Virgen Mar√≠a, Jes√∫s y Dios Padre en esta localidad ubicada al noroeste de Roma.
Durante a√±os, ha reunido a cientos de fieles en encuentros de oraci√≥n, donde la figura de la Virgen, en ocasiones, derramaba l√°grimas de sangre. Cardia insist√≠a que este fen√≥meno era de origen sobrenatural, y sus seguidores, convencidos, la respaldaban.
Sin embargo, la situaci√≥n comenz√≥ a tornarse sospechosa. En marzo de 2024, tras una investigaci√≥n, el obispo responsable prohibi√≥ cualquier evento religioso p√∫blico y privado en el lugar, incluyendo misas, reuniones de oraci√≥n y peregrinaciones, dejando claro que la Iglesia no reconoc√≠a nada sobrenatural en Trevignano. Poco despu√©s, el Vaticano aval√≥ esta decisi√≥n.
La investigaci√≥n judicial que destap√≥ a la supeusta vidente
Publicidad
El golpe final lleg√≥ con la investigaci√≥n judicial. El genetista forense Emiliano Giardina est√° a cargo del caso, y los resultados oficiales se entregar√°n el pr√≥ximo 28 de febrero.
Mientras tanto, Cardia enfrenta acusaciones de fraude y enriquecimiento il√≠cito , con peregrinos exigiendo la devoluci√≥n de sus donaciones.
Publicidad
La abogada de Cardia, Solange Marchignoli, defiende a su clienta argumentando que la coincidencia del ADN se debe a que Cardia ha tenido contacto f√≠sico constante con la estatua: la bes√≥, la manipul√≥ y, por lo tanto, habr√≠a transferido su material gen√©tico. Pide paciencia hasta que se conozcan los resultados definitivos del peritaje.
Puedes ver | Aparece una silueta en forma de la Virgen Mar√≠a en un barrio de Bosa
√önete a nuestro canal de Whatsapp para tener de primera mano el mejor contenido de entretenimiento y m√∫sica

author: TimesLIVE
title: Several provinces should brace for severe thunderstorms on Friday
text: Several provinces should brace for severe thunderstorms on Friday Government has urged residents of Western Cape, Eastern Cape, Northern Cape, KwaZulu-Natal, North West and Free State to take precautions and follow instructions from their provincial disaster management centres to keep safe. This request was made after the South African Weather Services issued severe weather alerts, including severe thunderstorms, damaging and strong winds, and disruptive rains in these provinces for Friday. ‚õàÔ∏èWeather outlook for Friday,‚Äî SA Weather Service (@SAWeatherServic) Partly cloudy and warm, but cool in places in the east with isolated showers and thundershowers, but widespread to scattered over the central parts. ‚ö†Ô∏èWarning: Severe thunderstorms- heavy rain and strong winds with possibility of hail. [#saws] [pic.twitter.com/qRNOp2IKdn] [December 28, 2023] The weather service said it will be partly cloudy and warm, but cool in places in the east with isolated showers and thundershowers, but widespread to scattered over the central parts. It warned of severe thunderstorms in some parts with heavy rain and strong winds with the possibility of hail. This comes as some parts of KwaZulu-Natal are still reeling from the devastation caused by recent floods, where some people are still unaccounted for. TimesLIVE

author: archyde
title: Venezuela's Response to British Warship Deployment: Tensions Escalate Over Oil-Rich Region - Archyde
text: 2023-12-28 21:16:00 Tensions with Great Britain Venezuela reacts to warship deployment with maneuvers December 28, 2023, 10:16 p.m. Listen to article This audio version was artificially generated. More info | Send feedback Oil discoveries in Guyana are arousing desire in neighboring Venezuela. In order to put Caracas in its place, Guyana‚Äôs former colonial power Great Britain is moving a warship to the region. Now Venezuela is responding with a military maneuver. Tensions between Great Britain and Venezuela have continued to escalate. In response to the deployment of a British warship off the coast of Venezuela‚Äôs neighboring country Guyana, Venezuelan President Nicol√°s Maduro announced a military exercise in which more than 5,600 soldiers are to take part. Maduro said the ‚Äúdefensive‚Äù exercise was a response ‚Äúto the United Kingdom‚Äôs provocation and threat against the peace and sovereignty of our country.‚Äù Against the backdrop of a border dispute between Venezuela and Guyana over the oil-rich Essequibo region, Great Britain announced on Sunday that it would send a warship ‚Äì and thus drew the ire of the government in Caracas. The British Ministry of Defense said the patrol boat ‚ÄúHMS Trent‚Äù would visit ‚Äúregional ally and Commonwealth partner Guyana‚Äù in December. Venezuela‚Äôs Defense Minister Vladimir Padrino L√≥pez described the deployment of the British ship as a ‚Äúprovocation‚Äù. He also referred to an agreement reached in mid-December between Maduro and Guyana‚Äôs President Irfaan Ali, in which both sides pledged to refrain from violence and threats of violence. Tensions had previously escalated massively over the Essequibo region in Guyana, which Venezuela has claimed as its own for more than a century. At the beginning of December, participants in a non-binding referendum in Venezuela voted by a large majority in favor of Essequibo‚Äôs membership in Venezuela, according to government information. Shortly afterwards, Maduro called for the area to be declared a Venezuelan province by law and for oil production licenses to be issued. Around 125,000 of the 800,000 residents of the former British and Dutch colony of Guyana live in Essequibo. Venezuela‚Äôs desires increased after the oil company ExxonMobil discovered an oil deposit in the area in 2015. In October, another significant oil discovery was made in the region. 1703803667 #Tensions #Great #Britain #Venezuela #responds #warship #deployment #maneuvers [Read more: In Hong Kong, "It is striking how inadequate the Chinese government is in dealing with the situation"](https://www.archyde.com/in-hong-kong-it-is-striking-how-inadequate-the-chinese-government-is-in-dealing-with-the-situation/)

author: R√©mi Agustina
title: Thales Alenia Space. Trois sites se mobilisent contre les 1237 suppressions d'emplois
text:
Cr√©dits photo : R√©volution Permanente
Thales Alenia Space (TAS), entreprise sp√©cialis√©e dans la production de satellites et appartenant majoritairement au g√©ant de l‚Äôa√©rospatiale et de la d√©fense Thales, [avait annonc√© en mars 2024 le ¬´ plan Th√©mis ¬ª](https://www.revolutionpermanente.fr/Thales-supprime-1300-postes-dans-l-aerospatial-pour-les-redeployer-dans-l-armement) comprenant la suppression de 1 237 postes. Ainsi, le site de Charleroi en Belgique est sous la menace de 115 suppressions d‚Äôemplois, tandis qu‚Äôen France, les sites de Cannes et de Toulouse sont menac√©s de perdre respectivement 330 et 650 emplois.
Les travailleurs avaient d√©j√† montr√© leur opposition avec une premi√®re gr√®ve au mois de juin sur le site toulousain, et [une autre le 17 septembre](https://www.revolutionpermanente.fr/Thales-Des-centaines-de-salaries-debrayent-contre-les-suppressions-de-postes-a-Toulouse) lors de laquelle ont d√©bray√© des centaines de travailleurs. Ce mardi 26 novembre, les salari√©s se sont mobilis√©s une troisi√®me fois, cette fois-ci, √† l‚Äô√©chelle des trois sites avec [plus de 500 travailleurs qui ont d√©bray√©s en France et en Belgique](https://information.tv5monde.com/international/mobilisation-contre-les-redeploiements-dans-la-branche-spatiale-de-thales-2750445). √Ä Toulouse, l‚Äôappel de l‚Äôintersyndicale locale, compos√©e de FO, de la CFE-CGC, de la CFDT et de la CGT, un rassemblement s‚Äôest tenu √† l‚Äôentr√©e du site, rassemblant plus de 200 salari√©s.
? Mobilisation √† Thal√®s Alenia Space.
Plusieurs centaines de salari√©s se sont rassembl√©s devant le site toulousain ce mardi pour s'opposer aux 1237 suppressions de postes en Europe, dont 650 √† Toulouse.
[pic.twitter.com/SnTXoQ08Ts]‚Äî R√©volution Permanente (@RevPermanente)
[November 26, 2024]
Lors des prises de parole, les syndicalistes ont d√©nonc√© des licenciements, alors m√™me que les carnets de commande de l‚Äôentreprise sont plus que pleins, et que [la charge de travail est d√©j√† trop √©lev√©e](https://www.revolutionpermanente.fr/Thales-supprime-1300-postes-dans-l-aerospatial-pour-les-redeployer-dans-l-armement). C‚Äôest ce dont t√©moigne le dossier presse pr√©sent√© par les syndicalistes, qui ont expliqu√©, chiffres √† l‚Äôappui, que ¬´ le march√© des satellites g√©ostationnaires explose... les carnets de commande sont pleins √† 3 ans voire au-del√† [...] Aucune explication rationnelle n‚Äôest donn√©e √† ce jour concernant ce plan de suppression d‚Äôemplois. ¬ª En r√©alit√©, le groupe TAS veut ¬´ red√©ployer ¬ª les emplois dans le secteur de l‚Äôarmement, bien plus lucratif, ce qui aura un impact sur la charge de travail des personnes restantes.
Afin de mettre un coup d‚Äôarr√™t au plan de la direction, les diff√©rents membres de l‚Äôintersyndicale ont pr√©sent√© leur strat√©gie lors du rassemblement, qui consiste √† recueillir le soutien des √©lus locaux et nationaux pour peser sur la direction et sur l‚Äô√âtat, actionnaire √† hauteur de 26 %. Dans cette perspective, Antoine Maurice, √©lu √©cologiste de Toulouse, a par exemple √©t√© invit√© √† intervenir au cours du rassemblement pour t√©moigner de son soutien aux salari√©s. De la m√™me mani√®re, de nombreux courriers ont √©t√© envoy√©s aux √©lus locaux et nationaux, et une visite du site avec le [s√©nateur communiste Fabien Gay a √©t√© organis√©e](https://x.com/fabien_gay/status/1862217488932483113?s=46) le jeudi 28 novembre.
Une strat√©gie qui permet de populariser la lutte et qui doit aller de pair avec la construction d‚Äôun rapport de force par la gr√®ve. En effet, face √† la d√©termination de la direction de Thal√®s le d√©veloppement d‚Äôune gr√®ve forte sera n√©cessaire pour faire plier le patronat. Cette nouvelle journ√©e de mobilisation, qui a rassembl√© √† nouveaux de nombreux salari√©s, montre la possibilit√© de construire une lutte dure pour refuser toute suppression d‚Äôemplois.
Plus largement, alors que les plans de licenciements se multiplient dans le secteur de l‚Äôindustrie, il est plus qu‚Äôurgent de coordonner les diff√©rentes r√©ponses qui commencent √† s‚Äôexprimer √† travers le pays. Dans ce sens, √† Toulouse et au sein m√™me du secteur de l‚Äôa√©ronautique, des initiatives communes avec les salari√©s d‚ÄôAirbus D√©fense and Space, qui [sont eux aussi concern√©s par un plan de licenciement de grande ampleur](https://www.revolutionpermanente.fr/CGT-Airbus-Defense-and-Space-La-crise-du-spatial-est-un-mensonge-pour-supprimer-des-postes), pourrait constituer une √©tape importante.
De ce point de vue, la journ√©e de mobilisation nationale du secteur industriel contre la destruction massive d‚Äôemplois [du 12 d√©cembre](https://www.cgt.fr/actualites/france/mobilisation/emploi-industrie-services-publics-la-cgt-ne-laissera-pas-faire-la-destruction-massive-demplois#:~:text=Le%2012%20d√©cembre%202024%2C%20la,ceux%20qui%20les%20ont%20produites%20!) appel√©e par la CGT peut √™tre une √©tape pour amplifier la lutte, √† condition qu‚Äôelle s‚Äôinscrive dans un mouvement coordonn√© et structur√© qui cherche r√©ellement √† nationaliser la lutte pour le maintien de l‚Äôemploi et d√©fende clairement l‚Äôinterdiction des licenciements, ainsi que l‚Äôembauche en CDI de tous les int√©rimaires et CDD.

author: Kurt Zindulka
title: Islamists Arrested over Christmas Terror Attack Plot on Cologne Cathedral
text:
Several suspected Islamist terrorists have been arrested in Germany and Austria over alleged planned attacks during the Christmas holiday season including at the Cologne Cathedral, which was searched by police with explosive-sniffing dogs on Saturday evening.
According to a report from Bild , Germany‚Äôs largest-circulation newspaper, police have arrested several suspected terrorists said to be from Tajikstan and who allegedly planned to carry out terror attacks in Europe on Christmas or New Year‚Äôs Eve. The suspected Islamist terrorists are believed to have connections to the ‚ÄúIslamic State in Khorasan Province‚Äù an offshoot of ISIS primarily located in Afghanistan.
One of the chief targets of the seemingly foiled terror attack was the 13th-century Cologne Cathedral, Germany‚Äôs most-visited tourist attraction. On Saturday evening, police searched the historic site with bomb-detecting dogs to ensure that no explosives had already been hidden in the cathedral.
23 December 2023, North Rhine-Westphalia, Cologne: The still image from a video shows a police sniffer dog on duty at the cathedral. Visitors to religious services at Cologne Cathedral and tourists will have to be prepared for increased security standards over the next few days. Photo: Sascha Thelen/dpa (Photo by Sascha Thelen/picture alliance via Getty Images)
A Cologne Police spokesman said: ‚ÄúDue to a warning of danger for Cologne Cathedral, the Cologne police will take special protective measures from this evening. The police will not comment on details of the available findings due to ongoing investigations by the police state security service.‚Äù
Even despite the arrests, security measures will be stepped up over the next week, with all visitors to the cathedral set to be screened before being permitted to enter the building.
Cologne Police Chief Michael Esser said: ‚ÄúEven if the reference refers to New Year‚Äôs Eve, we will take everything into account this evening to ensure the safety of cathedral visitors on Christmas Eve. In coordination with the security officer of the cathedral chapter, the cathedral is searched with sniffer dogs after the evening mass and then locked. Tomorrow all visitors will be screened before entering the church.‚Äù
Risk of Islamist Terror ‚ÄòHigher Than it Has Been For a Long Time‚Äô Because of Hamas, Says German Intelligence https://t.co/JBTMPLgVMc
‚Äî Breitbart London (@BreitbartLondon) December 1, 2023
In addition to standing as one of Germany‚Äôs top historical landmarks, the Cologne Cathedral was also the epicentre of the infamous sex attacks on New Year‚Äôs Eve in 2015, which was brought to international attention by reporting from Breitbart London. Over a thousand women in Cologne claimed to have been sexually assaulted, with the majority describing their attackers as appearing to be of North African or foreign descent.
On top of the alleged plot in Cologne, other targets for the suspected Islamist terrorists included locations in Madrid, Spain and Vienna, Austria where several of the arrests on Saturday were made.
‚ÄúDue to a current threat assessment by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and the continued increased terror alert level, there is generally an increased risk in Austria during the Christmas holidays,‚Äù a Vienna Police spokesman said.
The arrests come after multiple terror attacks across Europe in the wake of the October 7th Hamas terror attack on Israel, with Islamist jihadis killing multiple people in Belgium and France. Earlier this month, the European Union warned that because of the war between Israel and Hamas, there was a ‚Äúhuge risk‚Äù of Islamist terror attacks in Europe during the Christmas holiday season.
Other Tajik members of the ‚ÄúIslamic State in Khorasan Province‚Äù terror group were arrested in Germany and the Netherlands over the Summer over an alleged plot to carry out a major terror attack. The seven-member group had reportedly smuggled into Germany after posing as refugees from Ukraine with fake documents.
